source.sqlReaderQuery: SELECT * FROM dbo.Pages  WHERE TableName LIKE 'ExtraTest';
SELECT * FROM dbo.Pages  WHERE TableName LIKE 'VismaExtraTest';
SELECT * FROM dbo.Pages  WHERE TableName LIKE 'VismaExtraTest';

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT TOP(5) ItemSKU, Description, ItemVAT, ItemSalePrice, RowNum FROM (SELECT *,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ItemSKU) As RowNum FROM [dbo].[ExtraTest]) AS FullTable WHERE RowNum >',variables('Limit') )

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT count(*) AS TOTAL 
FROM dbo.ExtraTest

sqlReaderQuery.value: @concat('SELECT TOP(5) ItemSKU, Description, IteminStock, LastCostPrice, AverageCostPrice, RowNum FROM (SELECT *,ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ItemSKU) As RowNum FROM [dbo].[VismaExtraTest]) AS FullTable WHERE RowNum >',variables('Limit') )

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT count(*) AS TOTAL 
FROM dbo.VismaExtraTest

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		ItemSKU as string,
		PimcoreID as string,
		Description as string,
		ItemOfferPrice as double,
		ItemVAT as string,
		ItemCostPrice as double,
		ItemSalePrice as double,
		EnableWebShop as string,
		PrimaryBarcode as string,
		SecondaryBarcode as string,
		VismaModificationDate as string,
		PIMmodificationDate as string,
		UpdateDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> ExtraTest
ExtraTest derive(SecondaryBarcode_New = replace( replace(SecondaryBarcode, '[{"Barcode":"', ''), '"}]', ''),
		Today = toString(currentUTC()),
		PIMcore_New = toInteger(PimcoreID),
		NewSalePrice = toString(ItemSalePrice)) ~> SecondaryBarcode
SecondaryBarcode alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow
AlterRow sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		ID as integer,
		ItemSKU as string,
		Cost as string,
		BarCodePrincipal as string,
		BarCodeSecondary as string,
		BarCodePrin_Update as string,
		BarCodeSec_Update as string,
		Supplier as string,
		Updated as string,
		ItemInStock as string,
		ItemSalePrice as string
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:true,
	keys:['ItemSKU'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	mapColumn(
		ID = PimcoreID,
		ItemSKU,
		BarCodePrincipal = PrimaryBarcode,
		BarCodeSecondary = SecondaryBarcode_New,
		Updated = Today,
		ItemSalePrice = NewSalePrice
	)) ~> sinkPimcore
